name: Vihang Group
description: Vihang Group is a diversified company primarily focused on providing innovative solutions in the aviation and aerospace sector. Established in 1998, the company has grown to become a key player in the industry, offering a range of services including aircraft maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO). Vihang Group is committed to enhancing safety and efficiency in air travel by leveraging cutting-edge technology and skilled expertise. With a strong emphasis on quality and customer satisfaction, the company has formed strategic partnerships with various aviation stakeholders, ensuring its position as a trusted service provider. In addition to MRO services, Vihang Group is involved in the manufacturing of specialized aviation components, contributing to the broader aerospace supply chain. The company prides itself on its rigorous adherence to international regulations and standards, ensuring that its operations are compliant and reliable. As the aviation industry continues to evolve, Vihang Group is dedicated to investing in research and development to stay at the forefront of technological advancements. With a vision to revolutionize the aviation sector, Vihang Group aims to provide sustainable and cost-effective solutions that not only meet but exceed the expectations of its clients.

seo.meta_description: Explore Vihang Group, a leader in aviation and aerospace solutions, providing top-notch MRO services and innovative products to enhance air travel safety and efficiency.

faq.question: What services does Vihang Group provide?
faq.answer: Vihang Group provides aircraft maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) services, as well as manufacturing of aviation components and flight training.

faq.question: Where is Vihang Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Vihang Group is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vihang Group?
faq.answer: Rajesh Vihang is the CEO of Vihang Group.
